fchen

类 DiffVFS

  • java.lang.Object
    • fchen.DiffVFS

  • public class DiffVFS
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the DiffVFS protocol proposed in our paper which can enable both verifiable file search and user access control. For file search verifiability,the basic idea is to separate all possible filenames into two sets: one includes all existing filenames; the other contains all other possible filenames using wildcard representation of strings. Note that all these filenames are contained in one data structure. When the client queries a file, he can send the MACs of all possible filenames to the cloud for search, instead of all clear filenames. For access control, the basic is to first assign different keys for different security levels, and then embed different keys into our proposed protocol in a tight-coupled fashion.
    作者:
    Chen, Fei, Department of Computer Science and Engineering, Shenzhen University, China., Email: chenfeiorange@163.com, Webpage: https://sites.google.com/site/chenfeiorange/, Last Update Date: 2015.08.03

    • 字段详细资料

      • SPECIAL_PREVIOUS

        public static final java.lang.String SPECIAL_PREVIOUS
        SPECIAL_PREVIOUS = "@"; It is a special symbol, denoting that a queried filename is a prefix of some existing file. SPECIAL_AFTER = "#"; It is a special symbol, denoting that a queried filename is different from all existing files. Note that "#" lies behind the first place where the queried filename is different.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • SPECIAL_AFTER

        public static final java.lang.String SPECIAL_AFTER
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

    • 构造器详细资料

      • DiffVFS

        public DiffVFS(java.lang.String rootDirectory,
       int securityLevels)
        It constructs an object dealing with all files in a directory. Specifically, it constructs a tree storing all possible filenames and their MACs.
        参数:
        rootDirectory - The directory for all the files to be outsourced.

    • 方法详细资料

      • print

        public void print()
        It prints out the information about all possible filenames and their MACs.

      • keyGen

        public void keyGen()

      • outsource

        public void outsource()
        It helps the client to outsource all possible files to the cloud, including both the filenames and their MACs. The original filename is MACed; thus, the cloud cannot figure out the real filename. Since we divide data into multiple security levels, we construct the outsourced data in multiple steps, with each step handling a security level. Security level starts from the index 1 and grows upwards.

      • query

        public java.lang.String[] query(java.lang.String filename,
                       int securityLevel)
        It helps the client send a query to the cloud.
        参数:
        filename - The file to be queried.
        返回:
        A string array storing all possible filenames in a MACed way.

      • search

        public ProofData search(java.lang.String[] filename)
        It helps the cloud search the filenames which are queried by the client.
        参数:
        filename - The file to be queried.
        返回:
        A proof data object containing the verification information.
        另请参阅:
        ProofData

      • verify

        public int verify(java.lang.String filename,
         int securityLevel,
         ProofData proof)
        It helps a client verify whether the returned result from the cloud is correct.
        参数:
        filename - The queried file.
        proof - The proof that the cloud returns.
        返回:
        An integer indicating whether search is successful and whether the cloud cheats. '0' denotes search failure; '1' denotes a verifiable search; '2' denotes the cloud cheats.

      • getRandomFile

        public java.lang.String getRandomFile()
        It generates a random filename, with its security level embedded in the filename. This function is mainly for performance evaluation purpose.
        返回:
        A random existing filename.

      • bytes2HexString

        public static java.lang.String bytes2HexString(byte[] b)
        It transforms a byte array into a string in the Hexadecimal format in an entry-wise way.
        参数:
        b - The byte array.
        返回:
        The hexadecimal string.
